title: Straight To Me
description: Madison starts her weekend like any other; pretending that everything's fine. Recently divorced, no home or valuables to call her own, she hates that her life plan to be married, working in a successful job and becoming a mother, has failed.On a chance encounter, Madison's life is flipped on it's head after she meets the Vice President of the Rippers motorcycle club, Dean Carter.Dean knows deep down she would be safer without him, believes he doesn't deserve any real happiness in this life. But after coming to her rescue, he takes the risk, breaking the rules to make her stay.Tortured by trauma, consumed by his history, Dean struggles between protecting the only woman he's ever loved and fighting for his club.In this dual point of view, action romance, tough decisions must be made. The past must be faced. Secrets must be uncovered.Because not everyone is who they say they are...
author: Emily Catlow
